metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10360 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The do_core_note function in readelf.c in libmagic.a in file 5.33 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read andapplication crash) via a crafted ELF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.1
libmagic1 - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.1
python-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.1
python3-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: file package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.25-2ubuntu1.1').
